description:
go-tour: display images in websocket mode

Fixes issue 31.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

LGTM

I should say, it looks plausible.

The CL description seems wrong; it can't be issue 31.

On 3 April 2013 08:43, <gri@golang.org> wrote:

> The CL description seems wrong; it can't be issue 31.


This is for the go-tour project, not go.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=0afa8a2c0850 ***

go-tour: display images in websocket mode

Fixes issue 31.

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
